metadata.title: CVE-2022-33745 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: insufficient TLB flush for x86 PV guests in shadow mode For migration aswell as to work around kernels unaware of L1TF (see XSA-273), PV guests maybe run in shadow paging mode. To address XSA-401, code was moved inside afunction in Xen. This code movement missed a variable changing meaning /value between old and new code positions. The now wrong use of the variabledid lead to a wrong TLB flush condition, omitting flushes where such arenecessary.

criterions.comment: xen: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
